titles.title: I Worship Thee Sweet Will of God (familiar - e

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I worship Thee Sweet will of God And all Thy ways adore And every day I live I long To love Thee More and more{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And He hath breathed Into my soul A special love of Thee A love to lose My will in His And by that loss be free{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I love to kiss each print Where Thou hast sent Thine unseen feet I cannot fear Thee Blessed Will Thine empire Is so sweet{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I have no cares O blessed Will For all my cares Are Thine I live in triumph Lord for thou Hast made Thy tiumphs mine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All that He blesses Is our good And unblessed good Is ill And all is right That seems most wrong If it be His sweet will{/lang-eng}
